spell.name: Acid Splash
spell.shortDescription: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one creature within range, or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage. This spells damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6) and 17th level (4d6).
